bibl.title: From Athens to Alexandria: Hellenism and Social Goals in Ptolemaic Egypt. (Studia Hellenistica. 26.)
bibl.note: Introduction: On the Economic Goals and Tacit Assumptions. - Ch. I: The Greek Background. - Ch. II: Economics and Technology in Ptol. Egypt. - Ch. III: Culture and Society of the Greeks in Egypt. - Ch. IV: The Stability of Greek Culture in Egypt.
Samuel Alan E., From Athens to Alexandria: Hellenism and Social Goals in Ptolemaic Egypt. (Studia Hellenistica. 26.)
